## 

## Learning objectives

Utilize R to load, pre-process, and explore data through visualization and summarization techniques.

### Lesson plan

-   How to install R, Rstudio
-   Some basics of R
-   Objects : numerical objects, text objects (string type, character in R), how to assign a value into an object
-   Vectors : how to create vector? vector operation, how to assign values into a vector
-   Operation in R (including some modern operations and techniques too)
-   functions in R (built in functions; mean(), var(), sd(), sqrt(), length() , seq(), rep() ... most commonly used functions), functions in packages ; what is package
-   how to make a function
